content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: Mark Rothko style color field composition with large luminous areas of color that seem to breathe and glow from within, soft edges between color zones creating gentle transitions, colors chosen for emotional and spiritual resonance, minimal composition inviting contemplation and meditation. Capturing the vibe of clarity, revelation. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
generation.full_prompt: Create a 1024x1024 abstract artwork: Mark Rothko style color field composition with large luminous areas of color that seem to breathe and glow from within, soft edges between color zones creating gentle transitions, colors chosen for emotional and spiritual resonance, minimal composition inviting contemplation and meditation. Capturing the vibe of clarity, revelation. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
